titles.title: He Is Our Refuge, He Is Our Helper

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is our refuge, He is our helper
He is the hope of Israel,
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He was wounded for our transgressions,
He was bruised for our iniquities;
He was oppressed,
He was afflicted,
Yet He opened not His mouth.
